Yeah, but there's that casino......

A C.F.O., huh???  REALLY.  Somehow I fucking doubt that line of bullshit you're trying to sling, Arsventure.  Otherwise ... you wouldn't be wasting your time uploading and downloading cheap shit like this excrement ... especially from fucking AUDIO CASSETTES!!!
